There were no other sightings in Todd Mission on or around October 10th 2010
divs: sighting details there was a wild camping area with "revel camp fires". i was at the quiet family camping sites. i was on the very edge-cars would come to the end of a parking rd & they turned right 50 yards or less from my camp site-keeping me up most of the night. i kinda gave up & exited my tent for a late night snack, hoping it would help me finally sleep. it was quite dark there was no one in my area awake (no fires nor lights on) in the family section behind me-the neighboring camp site had left the tiki torch on closest to my site. i was sitting in my fold out chair when a beautiful glowing orange orb came towards the tree line near me- the trees were tall ne tx pines. i may have been looking toward the noisy campsites or gazing to see if it was another car coming towards me\my site, i sort of thought the glow of their fire was enhancing brighter then thought some sort of light was beamed @ me as if from a car --there were none for approx 5 min. at 1st it appeared that it was coming @ me but didn't make any quick turns that were obvious to me it just glided with ease. almost unapparent to the eye it lined up with trees & made a slight degree shift. the orb traveled the length of the adjoining field on the other side of the trees from me. the height was 3-5 ft from the tops of the trees, floating in a perfect line. i followed its movements until it was gone from my sight i looked a second time rechecking if it were still there-the trees became thicker @ the point of disappearance. i imagined that no one from the revel fires saw it - they were screaming, shouting, drumming, dancing & well partying a lot! if they did i would guess they were too wasted to be sure they saw anything. i got really spooked after being in complete awe just seconds before. realizing the torch was on near me i figured "it(ufo)" saw me. i quickly moved into my tent. i told my sleeping partner of the situation & she told me, "they were not interested in me-they were there for the other camp area(or something that imparted\reflected that notion)" this was almost comforting for i had that sense prior to waking her. approx 15 min after, to max 2 hrs-i saw lights glowing orange not red & @ another point around then was white lights near tent. i was kinda freaked out & was worried it was back & i was trying to sleep so much it all became a blurr once in the tent. the orb was a brilliant perfect deep fiery orange- at the round edges\the points rounded away from me it had a shadowy quality or sort of slivery dark element. warp effect yet remaining perfectly spherical- this shading was within the object. there was absolutely no sound emanating from the object or any where near me. the revel fires were approx 2 football fields away.
Summary: orange fire colored orb approx pumpkin sized/about head sized/12"x12"(1 ft circumference)
